XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='EnsLib.HL7.Message' targetClass='Webinar.RequestMsg' sourceDocType='2.3.1:ADT_A01' create='new' language='objectscript' > <assign value='source.{PID:PatientAddress().streetaddress}_", "_source.{PID:PatientAddress().city}' property='target.Address' action='set' /> <assign value='source.{PID:PatientName().givenname}_""_source.{PID:PatientName().middleinitialorname}_" "_source.{PID:PatientName().familylastname}' property='target.Name' action='set' /> <assign value='##class(Webinar.Luach).HebrewDate($H)' property='target.HebrewUpdateDate' action='set' /> </transform>
